page.title: 11 KINGDOM HALL
page.content: During the weekend of May 18th and 19th 1985 about eight hundred Jehovah's witnesses came from Canada,Jamaica, Africa and Europe to build a new Kingdom Hall in Montague Street.The foundations had been laid in April 1985 but the rest of the building work was completed in one and a half days.At least one hundred people worked all through Saturday night. Everyone had a job to do including first aid and making refreshments.The people looked like ants hard at work.The building was finished on Sunday afternoon at 4.15p.m for use complete with gardens, central heating, plumbing, electicity and carpets.
